author: cobblecat
title: East Africa Cardano Innovation Hub
description: Since there is no hub for coordination and space for Cardano enthusiasts to collaborate, it is limiting the growth of Cardano in East Africa
solution: A Hub designed for collaboration; to allow people to share experiences, learn from one another and outsource or seek for talent.
experience:
Running a co-working/living space
Cardano Community Organizer in Ethiopia
